Title: Directs the New York state thruway authority to discontinue the collection of tolls at the Grand Island bridges in the Niagara section of the thruway
Summary: Directs the New York state thruway authority to discontinue the collection of tolls at the Grand Island bridges in the Niagara section of the Governor Thomas E. Dewey Thruway.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to discontinuing the collection of tolls at the Grand Island bridges in the Niagara section of the New York state thruway
